message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hey Alice, thanks for the offer, but $120 is a bit too steep for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $85. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $105 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $95. If you're not able to accept that, I'll have to go with John's offer.

Hi Bob, I understand that $105 is still a bit high for you, and I appreciate your willingness to go up to $95. However, I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $100.
